RUCRTRPG.markdownDescription: The Create RPG Test Suite (RUCRTRPG) command compiles RPGLE and SQLRPGLE source members containing test procedures into a iRPGUnit test suite service program.

RUCRTCBL.markdownDescription: The Create COBOL Test Suite (RUCRTCBL) command compiles CBLLE and SQLCBLLE source members containing test procedures into a iRPGUnit test suite service program.

text.markdownDescription:
Text description

Allows you to enter text that briefly describes the RPGUnit test case and its function.

incDir.markdownDescription:
Include Directory

Specifies one or more directories to add to the search path used by the compiler to find copy files. The compiler will search the directories specified here if the copy files in the source program can not be resolved.

tgtCcsid.markdownDescription:
Target CCSID

Specifies the CCSID that the compiler uses to read the source files.
